text:
I want a test case where I could alternate between jdbc and http requests, 
however, if I include an HTTP URL Re-writing Modifier in my test plan, only 
the first jdbc request gets executed, and only if it is before a http 
request.
creator: udele.malabanan@na.whiteclarkegroup.com

text: NOt been seen recently; re-open if the problem is still present
creator: sebb@apache.org
